item.description:
I know this one's been out few several weeks but I haven't been able to get to it yet so I'm hoping some of you are in the same boat. The movie starts at 4:30 so let's meet by 4:15 in the lobby. If anyone's interested, I'm hoping to go to dinner and/or drinks afterwards.

A Single Man

George (Colin Firth) is a college professor who recently lost his lover, Jim (Nicholas Hoult), in a car accident. Terribly grief-stricken, George plans to commit suicide. As he goes about his daily routine and puts his affairs in order, his encounters with colleagues, students and an old friend (Julianne Moore) lead him to make a final decision as to whether life is worth living without Jim.
Cast: Colin Firth, Julianne Moore, Nicholas Hoult, Matthew Goode, Jon Kortajarena
Director: Tom Ford

http://asingleman-mov...
item.name: A Single Man - Movie and Dinner
